data.description: Delegation of powers, elements of fair administrative procedure, judicial control over administrative determination. Not open to students with credit for POLI SCI 420 prior to fall 2017
data.title: ADMINISTRATIVE LAW

data.description: Introduction to the legal process. Examination of the various concepts of law, the perennial problems of the law, legal reasoning, and the nature and function of law and the courts.
data.title: LAW, POLITICS AND SOCIETY
